participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Emma is creative and caring, often expressing herself through her love for animals and nature. She is optimistic and enjoys trying new things.
participant_1.background: i've brown curly hair. my bedroom is purple and lime green. i am a vegan. i like riding horses. i'll graduate from high school in two years.

participant_2.name: Ravi
participant_2.personality: Ravi is passionate and energetic, embracing the chaos of life with a humorous outlook. He values individuality and enjoys connecting with others through music.
participant_2.background: my favorite music genre is death metal. i'm a swim coach at my local pool. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my family and i are from india.
